title: Michael Shannon | A Closer Look: Al Franken Resigns; Donald Trump Jr. Testifies in Russia Investigation
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Senator Al Franken's resignation amid a growing sexual harassment scandal and how Donald Trump Jr. testified in the Russia investigation and refused to answer some questions on the basis of attorney-client privilege.

Michael Shannon tells Seth all about filming The Shape of Water, including how he wrecked an old Cadillac on set and what it was like torturing a monster.

Then, Shannon talks to Late Night producer Henry Melcher backstage at Studio 8G.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
